727687f-a.text:
Pitkin Avenue, south side, at about 88th Street, showing the IIsaac Doxsey Wouse. Phil Uhl was the last owner who sold it to M. Silverman, a land developer. Pitkin Avenue, here, is
the old South Noad.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection  -----1895

727688f-a.text:
Pitkin Ave. (O1d South Road), north side, in 88th Street, showing a rear view of the William Doxsey house. Shown also is the well house. If the house were standing in 1938 it would be just south of the Blake Avenue Street line in 88th Street.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
